ingredients.ingredient: 1 loaf focaccia bread, cut in half horizontally

cookingTips: Cook chicken thoroughly and slice into manageable pieces for easy sandwich eating
Steam or blanch broccoli briefly to retain crunch and reduce raw vegetable texture
Layer ingredients on focaccia and bake to melt cheese and warm filling without drying out chicken
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is an assembly-based sandwich that benefits from proper component preparation. How do you prefer to cook chicken breasts to keep them moist?
